item.title: White House trade adviser says India tariffs can drop if it ‘stops buying Russian oil’
item.description: Peter Navarro accused the country of funding Russia’s war in Ukraine and harming American taxpayers.

item.title: ICE asks for access to Chicago-area Navy base to assist operations
item.description: The request followed Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem’s declaration that a “strike team” of ICE agents would arrive in Chicago soon.

item.title: Poll: Republicans’ view of key federal agencies has improved in the last year
item.description: Republicans have a higher approval of several federal agencies under Trump than Biden, while Democrats’ approval rate has dropped.

item.title: Trump to hold meeting on Gaza aid efforts amid conflict and famine
item.description: U.S. Special Envoy to the Middle East and Russia Steve Witkoff blamed Hamas for holding up a truce. He projected a deal by the end of the year.

item.title: Michael Anton, longtime MAGA intellectual, to exit State Dept.
item.description: A member of President George W. Bush’s National Security Council, Anton later urged reluctant conservatives to back Donald Trump in 2016.
